import React, { useState } from 'react' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createPost } from '../actions/posts.js' function Form() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [data,setData] = useState({ fname:" ", lname:" ", email:" ", fileToUpload:" ", message:" ", }); const handelChange = (e)=>{ const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setData({...data,[name]:value}); console.log(data) } const handleSubmit=(e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createPost(data)); console.log("submit",data); } return (
